titles.title: Come let us worship and bow down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come let us worship and bow down,
(Come let us worship and bow down,)
Come let us worship and bow down,
(Come let us worship,)
Let us kneel before the Lord, our God, our Maker. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He is our God,
And we are the people of His pasture;
And the sheep of His hand,
Just the sheep of His hand.
